original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes weaker at 293.05/20 to dollar, bonds flat
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee was depreciated to 293.05/20 to the US dollar Monday from 292.95/293.00 to the US dollar on Friday dealers said, while bond yields were flat.
A bond maturing on 15.12.2026 closed at 10.50/75 down from 10.65/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 11.70/80 percent, down from 11.72/82 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.06.2029 closed stable at 11.95/12.05 percent. (Colombo/Nov04/2024)
